subject: ATTN.beneficiary ..
body:
ATTN.beneficiary ..
It's a pleasure to informs you that our new president Joe Biden of
United State American
 was on earlier this morning declared and given
order to release all compensation and Inheritance payments sending
through Bank to bank transfer, Consignment trunk box, ATM Card and
Cashier Check that has been ceased due to beneficiaries inability to
comply as law demands which your compensation payment worth
$4.200,000.00 is inclusive in that matter
According to the general speaker of the US government said on behalf
of Mr president's speech that every abandoned funds at Bank, custom
custody or at Airport shall be released today as soon as they paid as
soon as you write back to this new management authorized by the US
government to handle your payment.
Thank you and remain bless,
Mr Sak Roberto
Email Address to contact our office /    
Mrssakroberto2018@gmail.com

subject: Re: ATTN.beneficiary ..
body:
Hello Mr. Sak Roberto,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about these developments from President Joe Biden's administration.

Could you please elaborate more on this new policy? How does it work exactly? And how does it affect individuals like me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Patricia
